website_summaries.verdict: A rugged picnic backpack with features that are on par other top-quality models. Choose it if you don’t mind a slightly smaller insulated compartment and prefer solid stainless steel utensils.
pros: Padded shoulder straps are ideal for hiking
Crafted from all-weather, waterproof fabric and triple stitched for durability
Includes a detachable wine cooler and extra-large water-resistant picnic blanket
Bottle opener, cutlery, and salt and pepper shakers are all made of sturdy stainless steel
Earns high praise for its excellent insulation
cons: Wine cooler pocket is somewhat small

customer_reviews.title: Mostly excellent - no cutting board, cheap corkscrew
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality is very good. The pack itself is particularly well done and looks like it will last and look good for a long time. The lack of a small cutting board is sort of puzzling at this price point. Finally, after touting their all-stainless ("SOLID") utensils as being so much better than the flimsy plastic handles used by competitors, they included a corkscrew with a flimsy plastic handle. Ha! I really like this set, but if you have to buy a cutting board you might take a closer look at comparable sets that cost a bit less.
customer_reviews.author: JeffM

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach and Romantic picnics
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 4 person Picnic Backpack with Cooler because I go to concerts at the beach during the summertime. This is the perfect size for the beach, blanket, and accessories for snacks on the beach. This is lightweight, had one of the best reviews, and love the color. Vendor delivered as promised, packaging was fine, and would purchase from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet, but the experience of buying it was good and I like the seller support offered if needed. It's attractive. I'm giving it as a gift. I can't wait to try it at a picnic outing (as the giftee's guest). It's attractive, appears sturdy. I bought a 4 person with the intention of mostly using it for 2 people in the interest of having extra utensils with which to serve food. This one is nicer than others I saw. It's tasteful. The cooler compartment is big enough for at least 2 people and probably for four people with an appetite for quality over quantity. There is no smell to it when it's first opened, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packpack. Hold just enough stuff for a quick picnic or wine trip. I plan to use mine for sunsets from on top a hill. I will say the only disappointment is the wine pocket holds only traditional bottles. Some wine bottles today are larger diameter and won't fit. I with they would have provided more tolerance in the wine pocket size for larger bottles. I also wish they used a velcro flap to secure the bottle, instead of a zipper. These two nits are the only reason I didn't give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John Locke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good!
customer_reviews.text: Item is described as promised. I haven't had the chance to use it yet bc the weather hasn't been cooperating. Also, this blanket size is good for TWO PEOPLE not four. That said, I only need it for 2. If this is, in fact a generous size compared to similar products by other sellers (and it IS for sure bc I researched measurements), I am so glad I went with this set instead of the others. A smaller blanket size would be useless! Also, love the waterproof bottom on the blanket that came with this. Great design but another midsize pocket on the from would be helpful. Color scheme is better in person. Overall, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Great pack, low quality accessories
customer_reviews.text: The backpack itself is great. Nice design, and it is really well insulated. My friend and I had a bag of ice with an ice pack in it for two hours in a hot car and it stayed frozen. The flatware is nice for being a picnic backpack, and the blanket is waterproof on one side, so no worries about a damp ground. The rest of the items are relatively low quality, but functional, aside from the salt and pepper shakers which are worthless. Those things can be replaced though. I'm adding my own cutting board and knife as well. I haven't tried other picnic backpack sets, but I am satisfied with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Crazmey8

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness in a backpack
customer_reviews.text: Totally amazed. The quality is great. Nice to see true metal forks and knives way more room the I anticipated. Plus. The customer service is amazing. They contacted me within a few days of ordering and introduced themselves and how they stand behind everything they sell. Totally sold me on that. Thanks for a great product and superb customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sacher

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. Decent sized storage
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Decent sized storage. Nice utensils, plates and cloth napkins. Couple nit picking gripes the elastic to hold in the utensils is very stiff. It's a bit difficult to slide everything in and out. I may regard this as a plus in the future because if they loosen a bit they are still tight. Lastly the wine sleeve could use a wider or more elastic opening. Or if it zipped down slightly more. It did do a fantastic job of keeping the wine cold.
customer_reviews.author: cesar yanez

customer_reviews.title: Practical/attractive/decently made
customer_reviews.text: The backpack was a gift, so I'm not sure yet how much the recipients have used. I felt the contents (silverware, plates, napkins, and glasses) were pretty nice -nothing was damaged when I received the bag, there was a cutting board, the material for the bag was attractive. The detachable blanket also appeared to be useful. There was a small zipper at the opening of the side pocket 'bottle holder' which unfortunately did not really stay fully zipped (since it was so short) so I'm not sure it was needed. But overall I felt it was a practical attractive item for which the outdoorsy type couple I gave it to will get alot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A LaFranco

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This picnic backpack is AWESOME!!! My hubby bought it for me for us to attend a concert. The bag is super roomy and can hold allot of food. The wine cooler attachment on the side is very convenient and the blanket super comfy. I highly recommend the product, I promise you won’t be diasappointed. I monogrammed our bag and everyone complements how awesome it looks. So much so that I’ve had 3 other friends buy the backpack for me to monogram it for them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia A

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good deal but stay away from this
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good deal but stay away from this. The so called "cooler compartment" isn't ....I used sealed freezer packs to keep our food and drinks cold. The sweat from the bottles leaked through the bag and soaked my back seat and the "waterproof" blanket wasn't either. Check the comparables and choose something other than this!
customer_reviews.author: keith greer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet picnic backpack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the backpack as a Christmas gift for my brother & sister in law. When the bag came in my husband and I wanted to keep it! Sleek looking backpack. It has an insulated wine holder as well as insulated zipper pocket for food. I love that it comes with a blanket and utensils for 4, even a cutting board and wine bottle opener. When my brother and sister in law opened their gift, they absolutely loved it. Giving it 5 stars, although I cannot vouch for the quality of the bag or utensils since we gave it as a present.
customer_reviews.author: Claudine H

customer_reviews.title: N/a
customer_reviews.text: Was bought for my son and girlfriend as gift they do lots of excursions, hiking, then really liked it, strong material, ustensils, very nice solid blanket, used it all together 2 weekends ago when visiting them, having a picnic on top of the mountain...even having a glass of wine, from there reactions they really enjoy it. Beautiful product..beautiful handy gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift, so haven't actually tried using it. The plates and wine glasses were not quite as big as I had expected. And the silverware doesn't seem to be really very sturdy. The design is a great idea, but doesn't seem to leave much room inside for food. The fabric seems to be sturdy, and I like the attached blanket and wine cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lee-Denoyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my brother and girlfriend. He was really excited about it. But I DID take a peak at it before giving it to him. Not a single thing I don't like. The backpack itself is sturdy, very well made. I am yet to use the wine holder but it seems well insulated. The blanket I assumed would be an average size throw, but it significantly larger! Plenty of room for 4 adults to sit on. Very happy, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Marpert

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this after reading reviews for almost all bags available on amazon
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything !! This cute little bag looks small but it can store tons of food for a picnic for 4. It is sturdy, easy to clean, comfortable to carry, nice storage (which does not appear looking at the size but has the capacity). I also store baby food in this for my 6-month-old. It works great! Overall - yes buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruchi Jain

customer_reviews.title: Solid stainless steel utensils.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made packback. I ordered this one because it has solid steel utensils. The other ones i looked at had handles made from either plastic or wood and I was afraid they would not hold out overtime. I love the blanket and the wine bottle carrier as well. The insulated interior is very spacious. This will be idea for taking with us to the beach. My only complaint is that the plates and glasses are are little on the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Lee E. Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our company Christmas gifts this year, and they are exactly what we were going they would be. The quality of each backpack is outstanding, as are the items in them. There is ample space in the cooler section, as well, making them great for transporting food and beverage items. We have not gotten to use them yet, but we are excited to get the first chance to do so. If you are in the market for a picnic backpack, you will not be disappointed in this one!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Fontenelle

customer_reviews.title: No so solid
customer_reviews.text: All the material is quite solid except the glasses and the plates. One of the glasses was broken when arrived and I suspect the others won't last long. ONe of the plae did not survive a first dishwasher experience.
customer_reviews.author: Delphine delieux

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this set! Quality flatware and plates -- It is a beautiful bag as well -- I wish the bag was a bit larger in the insulated area though.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Bonick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful picnic backpack. Seems high quality and well made. This was a gift and they loved it. My only disappointment was there was no cutting board included as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Hlfzdc

customer_reviews.title: They loved it. I added a bottle of wine and ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as an engagement gift to a couple that hike a lot. They loved it. I added a bottle of wine and some containers to the cooler section. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not have enough food storage room room for one ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not have enough food storage room room for one person let four, would not keep a bottle of wine in it, failure of a product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip K

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Item For Sure
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a nice quality item. I have just browsed through it as it is a gift. The color was also very nice. I'm sure our family will enjoy it! It also got here in record time which I appreciated very much!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these backpacks as prizes for my Sales Department. We have ordered 10 of them so far, and each one is outstanding! Great quality, everything is packed up nicely on the inside. All packs arrived clean and none of the items on the inside were broken. Very nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and has everything I need for a picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for all!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and so much fun to use. Could be a little larger in the cooler department and would love to be able to personalize for my clients! Reached out to the vendor via Amazon but received no response. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a romantic picnic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and new daughter-in-law for their wedding shower. They have used it often. The items inside are sturdy yet light weight. Perfect for a romantic picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Seroka

customer_reviews.title: Loved this pack only bad thing was the glasses are ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this pack only bad thing was the glasses are not very sturdy the stem on one was broken when we opened the pack on our first outing.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Lass

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to carry. Very stylish. Love the bottle and blanket holder. The only thing I would suggest is a larger space for food to be stored. Love the plates, salt &a pepper holder, napkins etc. Terrific purchase that I would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LRS

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift and I must say the quality is amazing! I love it so much I want to ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for a gift and I must say the quality is amazing! I love it so much I want to purchase one for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and I am very happy with my purchase. It arrived quickly and is exactly as described. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: hschaubach

customer_reviews.title: It's a great looking bag
customer_reviews.text: The missus and I bought it for our first camping trip in the Catskills this Labor Day weekend. It's a great looking bag, and all the contents are nicely color matched. Most importantly, it seems to be well made. We had everything we needed, except for one item... a small cutting board (otherwise this would have been an easy 5 stars!).
customer_reviews.author: James Heygate-Browne

customer_reviews.title: they loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a wedding gift and separately purchased a cutting board to include with the gift...they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: I looked at it carefully and it looked great and seemed to be made very well
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift but I did see them open it and it was received with enthusiasm. I looked at it carefully and it looked great and seemed to be made very well.I liked that the dinnerware was real silverware and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McCarthey

customer_reviews.title: Good storage and big enough blanket
customer_reviews.text: Lovely gift for my friend - have used it once. Everything worked well so far. Good storage and big enough blanket.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis Martin

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT romantic wine and cheese picnic backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Love everything about it. The flattest is solid not with plastic handles, the blanket is high quality, the straps are high quality, the cooler is well insulated. No regrets whatsoever!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It's a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's a great deal for the price. I plan to buy these for closing gifts for my business.
customer_reviews.author: michelle carr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the backpack.......made to last a long time very durable......has everything one needs for a great picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in person
customer_reviews.text: I just received the backpack, and haven't unpacked everything yet, but at first glance it is really nice. The fabric looks expensive and well made, unlike some of the others I was considering. It's a gift for some great clients, and I am excited to present them with it. Very classy.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great picnic backpack packed with everything you need!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I found this sooner! This is a wonderful backpack, very light out of the package and easy to carry and repack. All contents were well packed and worked perfectly for a day long picnic trip. Tip - bring something to wipe the utensils off with after eating.
customer_reviews.author: April A Alldredge

customer_reviews.title: Useful Gift
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. This was a gift. My daughter was thrilled with the entire bag full of useful items. She plans to use it a lot. The quality was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: color of pack is differnet than ad photo not as nice
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality though
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend. The only recommendation I have it include a cutting board. I went and bought one and slid it into the plate pocket. Overall good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Teaching Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for small picnics
customer_reviews.text: Bag is great! Good quality equipment inside and the bag is well made. Only thing I would have liked to have a larger compartment for the food. Comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN MAGRATH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the backpack and all that was included.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchased. Have used it on the boat several ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchased. Have used it on the boat several times this summer. A little pricey but worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Davita Nobles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought the picnic backpack as a gift. It looks great. Everything looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good design, well thought through
customer_reviews.text: Everything was exactly as advertised. Well made, good design, well thought through, but compact. Love the blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Soderlind

customer_reviews.title: A picnic backpack makes for a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my friend and her fiance and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zoomzoomxpress

customer_reviews.title: Great urban picnic solution
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was exactly as described. The materials were high quality and it's well designed. Can't wait to use it.

customer_reviews.title: My friend absolutely loved it! I will get one for myself too
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift. My friend absolutely loved it! I will get one for myself too.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters birthday gift. It is a very nice quality and material... She loved it but hasn’t used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much that I have bought 3 more ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself a few months ago. I liked it so much that I have bought 3 more as gifts for friends. I often add a thermos, a paring/cheese knife and a small cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ransil

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift but the quality seems to be great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift but the quality seems to be great!

customer_reviews.title: when I got married my favorite gift was a hamper style picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: This was a bridal shower gift for my niece. Ages ago, when I got married my favorite gift was a hamper style picnic basket, this one is so very practical. Oh and my niece LOVED it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack for a light lunch and bottle of wine. Light and easy to carry.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it...got on Tuesday as guaranteed and used it for a concert in the park on Thursday!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is for a silent auction...and it has generated much exceitment

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this picnic bag set. It’s complete but i hoped for more of a solid utensils and wine glasses. I highly recommend this tho! It feels durable!
customer_reviews.author: abigail a.

customer_reviews.title: They said they really liked it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son and his wife. They said they really liked it.

customer_reviews.title: Picnic back pack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for some friends in Belgium, they love it! Would be nice if it came in different colors.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This made a great wedding gift and I was very pleased with the fast service. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely recommend! Bought as gift. It was great quality and more than worth the price!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The picnic backpack came in one day and everything was nicely packed with no missing pieces. Would definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We have this as a gift. It is well made and really nice. We will buy one for our family too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect wedding shower gift. They loved it and the fast shipping was wonderful.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my picnic backpack! Everybody have something to say when they see me use it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect festival backpack! Used it every part of it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer then the other ones on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Has lots of room and the nicer quality stemware is helpful, the plates and cups are cheaply made however but those can be replaced easily if/when they break. I purchased a different blanket to use that was larger but the included one might be fine for 2 people
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: the best quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional backpack for the price. I have given picnic baskets as wedding gifts for a long time now. This one is, by far, the best quality for the price. and I love the colors as well. I just ordered another of the same item for our son's friend who is getting married in November and I'm tempted to order one for myself as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use our picnic backpack but it looks great and seems to be a quality product. I can see why we spent a few extra dollars on this model. Should be very useful for us.
customer_reviews.author: F.Krugger

customer_reviews.title: Nice picnic backpack
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, good quality for the price. Gave it as a gift and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It Works as Advertised - One Can't Complain.
customer_reviews.text: Solid product choice. The bag is relatively substantial and looks trendy. Obviously you will want to substitute the cutlery inside. Perfect gift idea for those who like to listen to concerts in the park (I happen to live in NYC), among other things. There is plenty of room for 2-3 bottles of wine. For those concerned about carrying wine and/or other beverages about in public, the compartment in the back has plenty of room to fit 2 bottles discretely. I have yet to wash the blanket but thus far it works nicely. The blanket keeps you and your belongings dry, even on moist to wet grass. Some may find it a tad scratchy, but I was not bothered. 4/5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: James Bradley

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone else, they loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: One Earth Home 4 Person Picnic Backpack with Solid Stainless Steel Utensils, Oversized Water Resistant Fleece Blanket, Cooler Compartment, Detachable Wine Bottle Holder in a Modern Designed Backpack
product_meta.description:
It's ergonomically designed for long hikes or a day at the lake. The elegant bag design gives it a functioning high class look. Compare our quality and attention to detail with any other competitor and you will see that ours stands out. Quality done right and backed by a LIFETIME GUARANTEE

Bag

- Hidden triple stitched elegantly designed 4 person picnic backpack

- Padded shoulder straps and padded backside for long hikes

Stainless Steel Utensils and Bamboo Cutting Board!

- Solid stainless steel utensils, including handles, unlike other competitors with cheap, brittle plastic handles.

- Stainless Steel Wine Opener

- Stainless Steel Salt & Pepper Shakers

Full Sized Water Resistant Blanket with Travel Straps

- Size is 58x51 inches while competitors’ blankets are 45x53

- Bag has extra long blanket straps if you want to use a larger blanket

-Water Resistant blanket

Leather trimming to give that final polished touch

Full Bag Inventory

4 - Stainless Steel Utensils (Knives, Forks, Spoons)

4 - Plastic Wine Glasses

4 - 9" Dinner Plates

4 - Cotton Napkins

1 - Stainless Steel Set of Salt and Pepper Shakers

1 - Stainless Steel Bottle Opener

1 - Bamboo Cutting Board

1- 58x51 Water Resistant Picnic Blanket

1 - Portable Wine Cooler Sleeve

Please click "Add to Cart" to purchase the One Earth Home Picnic Backpack.
feature_bullets: LIFETIME WARRANTY - No questions asked. No other picnic backpack manufacturer will stand behind their products like we do.

HIGH QUALITY PICNIC SUPPLIES - We took the time to see what our competitors are selling and made our picnic backpack better. Our utensils are SOLID STAINLESS STEEL. Everyone else has a plastic handle that you can bend. BAMBOO cutting board. Our WATER RESISTANT FLEECE BLANKET is 58X51 – 25% LARGER than any competitor. Backpack includes (4) Cloth Napkins, (4) sets of solid stainless steel utensils, (4) Plastic Wine Glasses, (1) Set of Salt and Pepper shakers, (1) bottle opener with cork screw.
OVERSIZED BLANKET - Size is 58x51 inches while competitors are a small 45x53 size.
ZOOM IN – On our pictures and you will see the quality. ONE EARTH HOME is a new company by ONE EARTH HEALTH. Our reputation is expanding and offers high quality products to you.
HAND STITCHED LEATHER TRIMMING - It's all about the details.
